name: Find The Hidden Hoard
effect: The mage can find secret compartments within inanimate matter, discovering hidden doors, safes, and vaults. Extremely well-designed hidden compartments or rooms might levy a -1 or -2 dice penalty, but usually only the most refined or precise of such misdirectional architecture imposes this penalty.

rotes.roteDescription: With this rote, a Mysterium willworker is capable of detecting the presence of unseen spaces within seemingly solid structures.
